data.title: PAUZA Redolent Radio 193 by REDOLENT
data.meta_description: Stream PAUZA Redolent Radio 193 by REDOLENT on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2024-08-09T01:00:23Z

Pauza is the first electronic music, female duo, from La Habana, Cuba. Conformed by Paula Fernandez and Zahira Sanchez, both of them are DJs and producers that have re-interpreted house music with latin, folkloric and cuban rhythm. Recently, PAUZA has released various singles which already have thousands of plays across all streaming platforms. Among their singles, their hit song is âCarajilloâ, which has surpassed 200k plays on Spotify. This collaboration comes with Yadira âLa Realâ, who brings the perfect vocals to go with the essence of the cuban sounds. The cuban duo continues captivating the music industry throughout the continent with their music, now with their latest release on Redolent along Jalal Ramdani - Wataki, a summer latin house exceptional track that will be for sure a summer hit. Enjoy this Afro House Journey with PAUZA, including their latest release Wataki on Redolent! Tracklist 01. James Deron - OPE (Kings Of Ife & Victoric Leroy Remix) 02. PAUZA - Illusion (Dua Lipa Afro Sensation) 03. Monserratt, Roiman Dalis - Carnival 04. PAUZA, Jalaloni - Wataki (REDOLENT) 05. Dbasser - Pura Marabunta 06. Victor Guedez, Javiwer - Like Drums 07. La Santa, Augusto Yepes - Kalima (REDOLENT) 08. Cristian Vinci - Esa Marimba 09. Amal Nemer - Leyenda (Juan Mayorga Remix) 10. Roie Krief - Do It (NonCitizens Remix) 11. PAUZA - Monte 12. Fiin, Pezlo MD, Vikina - Mi Tierra (La Santa, G. Zamora Remix) (REDOLENT) 13. G.Zamora - Sin Tu Querer (M.E.M.O. Remix) (REDOLENT) This show is syndicated & distributed exclusively by Syndicast. If you are a radio station interested in airing the show or would like to distribute your podcast / radio show please register here: https://syndicast.co.uk/distribution/registration

Genre

Deep House
